actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise and clarify eligibility for reimbursement of expenses of travel for Veterans' Administration health care, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Excludes from repayment the first $5 of travel expenses to and from a Veterans' Administration facility when a person receives beneficiary travel involving programs administered by the Department of Veterans' Benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise and clarify eligibility for reimbursement of expenses of travel for Veterans' Administration health care, and for other purposes.
